briefdescription.para: Computes the ECC public key from the provided private key.

simplesect.para: Input and output parameters are in little endian format.

briefdescription.para: Computes the shared key between 2 devices.

simplesect.para: Input and output parameters are in little endian format.

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint8_t *pKey, uint8_t *pNonce, uint8_t *pCypherText, uint16_t textLen, uint8_t *pClear, uint16_t clearLen, uint8_t *pMic, uint8_t micLen, uint8_t *pResult, uint8_t handlerId, uint16_t param, uint8_t event)
memberdef.name: PalCryptoCcmDec

briefdescription.para: Execute the CCM-Mode verify and decrypt algorithm.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to additional, unencrypted authentication text.
Size of MIC in bytes (4, 8 or 16).
Buffer to hold result (returned in complete event).
Task handler ID to receive complete event.
Optional parameter passed in complete event.

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint8_t *pKey, uint8_t *pNonce, uint8_t *pPlainText, uint16_t textLen, uint8_t *pClear, uint16_t clearLen, uint8_t micLen, uint8_t *pResult, uint8_t handlerId, uint16_t param, uint8_t event)
memberdef.name: PalCryptoCcmEnc

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to additional, unencrypted authentication text.
Size of MIC in bytes (4, 8 or 16).
Buffer to hold result (returned in complete event).
Task handler ID to receive complete event.
Optional parameter passed in complete event.

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint8_t *pKey, uint8_t *pOut, const uint8_t *pIn, uint16_t len)
memberdef.name: PalCryptoAesCmac

briefdescription.para: Execute AES CBC transformation on payload and add 4 byte MIC.

detaileddescription.para:
pEnc
Encryption parameters.
pHdr
Packet header.
pBuf
Packet data.
pMic
Storage for MIC.
true if the MIC was set.
This routine completes the transformation in a blocking manner. This routine modifies the length field of the PDU to account for the MIC.

simplesect.para: Leave this implementation empty if inline hardware encryption is available.

briefdescription.para: Execute AES CBC transformation on payload and return MIC evaluation status.

detaileddescription.para:
pEnc
Encryption parameters.
pBuf
Packet data.
true if authentication successful, false otherwise.
This routine completes the transformation in a blocking manner. This routine modifies the length field of the PDU to account for the MIC.

simplesect.para: Leave this implementation empty if inline hardware encryption is available.
